mapper.select: with T01 as ( select G.id, G.name group_name, T.name type_name from stop_groups G left join stop_types T on G.stop_type_id = T.id ) select I.id, I.name item_name, T01.group_name, T01.type_name from stop_items I left join T01 on I.stop_group_id = T01.id where 1=1 and I.disable is null
select L.id, L.name, L.product_id, L.process_id, L.description, L.product_type_id, L.description from line L where 1 = 1 and L.product_id in (4,6)

select distinct A.model name from lots A where 1=1 and A.line = (select distinct name from line where id = #{line}) and A.shift = (select distinct code from shifts where id = #{shift}) AND A.date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND DATE_FORMAT(#{fromDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') order by id desc
